name: Pakistan
fact: The ancient Indus Valley Civilization, which dates back to 3300 BCE, was first discovered in modern-day Pakistan.

name: China
fact: The Great Wall of China, which stretches over 4,000 miles, is not visible from space.

name: India
fact: The Hindu festival of Holi, also known as the festival of colors, is celebrated by throwing colored powders at each other.

name: United States
fact: The shortest war in history was between the United States and the Hawaiian Islands, lasting only 45 minutes.

name: Indonesia
fact: Indonesia is the world's largest archipelago, comprising over 17,000 islands.

name: Brazil
fact: Brazil is home to the largest population of Japanese people outside of Japan.

name: Nigeria
fact: Nigeria has the highest number of twins born in the world, with an average of 20.8 twins per 1,000 births.

name: Bangladesh
fact: The national dress of Bangladesh is the lungi, a long piece of fabric wrapped around the waist.

name: Russia
fact: Russia's Lake Baikal is the world's largest and oldest freshwater lake, with about 20% of the world's unfrozen freshwater.

name: Japan
fact: Japan has the highest number of centenarians (people living to 100 or older) in the world.
